attributes.background:
I believe that these 'enclosed dog runs' would help resolve ongoing 'dog issues' IE: Dog fights, dog attacks.  Dogs that would greatly benefit from these are 'rescue' dogs as these are the ones with most issues. 
 I, myself have a rescue dog and people very often do not understand their needs.

rejection.details:
Local parks are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like an enclosed dog run in your local park, you could suggest this to your local councillor. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
